comment.brief: A variant of [TabPage](api:alive/tabpage) that keeps the previous and next pages partially in view.
comment.full:
A variant of [TabPage](api:alive/tabpage) that keeps the previous and next pages partially in view.

**Note:* The enclosing @PageControl must have the
[InactiveState](api:fuse/controls/pagecontrol/inactivestate) property set to
[Unchanged](api:fuse/controls/navigationcontrolinactivestate/unchanged).
[TabPageControl](api:alive/tabpagecontrol) does this automatically.

See [TabPage](api:alive/tabpage) for usage.
